column1: Lou Malnati's Pizzeria////If this is your first time trying deep dish from the area
column2: be prepared to wait 30-45 minutes for the pizza because that is how long it will take for the pizza to be made. As a New Yorker
column3: I was not used to that long of a wait for pizza because in New York
column4: you can get your pizza within seconds to minutes of ordering.
